meanings.definition: Frybreads: plural noun, a type of bread made by frying dough
meanings.sent1: My grandma makes delicious frybreads for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The frybreads at the fair smelled amazing.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my frybreads on the floor, but my dog was happy.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the frybreads in the pan was music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The golden brown color of the frybreads made them irresistible.

meanings.definition: Frybreads: verb, to cook bread by frying it in oil
meanings.sent1: I like to frybreads in a cast-iron skillet.
meanings.sent2: She carefully frybreads the dough until it turns crispy.
meanings.sent3: He tried to frybreads the bread in cold water - it didn't work!
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly frybreads the dough to perfection every time.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of frybreads frying filled the kitchen with a mouth-watering smell.
